title: 1969년 Smiley 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. James Smiley
**판결일**: 1969-02-06
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 31 A.D.2d 793

## 판결문 요약


Having reconsidered these appeals following the submission of supplemental briefs and the order of this court dated October 1, 1968 vzhich vacated its orders of September 19, 1968 which affirmed these appeals, this court now affirms the judgment of conviction rendered November 2, 1967 as also the orders entered August 16, 1967 and October 9, 1967 dismissing appellant’s writs of habeas corpus. Concur—Stevens, P. J., Eager, Capozzoli, McGivern and Rabin, JJ.
...
